description: This session sees the notorious Mistress Vixen with an array of brutal implements at her leather gloved hands, including the crop, flogger, single tail whip and the cane. As an expert in the fine art of corporal punishment is doesn’t take Mistress Vixen long to get into full swing, striking the slave’s entire body with vicious blows to break the most hardy of slaves. By the time she starts wielding the cane, the slave is understandably terrified and when the strokes start landing on his already bruised and battered flesh, he can all but scream out in agony.
title: The Confession - Part 3
